actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Social Security.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a cost-of-living adjustment for the thresholds used in determining the 85 percent inclusion of social security and tier 1 railroad retirement benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Social Security Equity Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a cost-of-living adjustment in thresholds used to determine social security and tier 1 railroad retirement benefits.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a cost-of-living adjustment for the thresholds used in determining the 85 percent inclusion of social security and tier 1 railroad retirement benefits.
